input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Gund 4048378 Dakota Horse Stuffed Animal Plush

Item features:
Dakota the horse, pink gingham saddle, fuzzy tan mane and tail, gingham flower bridle accent, adorable smile
Embroidered horseshoes on the hooves add chic, realistic detail
Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection celebrates the spirit of the west
Surface-washable; ages 1+
11 inch length (28 cm)
High quality, huggable, loyal pals for years to come. 
GUND has been a premier plush company for over 100 years; award-winning, beloved plush designs; appeals to next generation
Premium materials, unparalleled softness and huggability

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Get ready to become the best friend of a western cowgirl with the GUND Dakota Horse Stuffed Animal Plush! This adorable horse, with its fluffy mane and tail and pink gingham saddle, is sure to make you feel like you're on the range. The surface-washable material is easy to clean and ensures that your pal will be by your side for years to come. With its realistic details, including embroidered horseshoes on the hooves, this horse is sure to give you a authentic experience. At 11 inches in length, this horse is the perfect size to bring along on all your adventure.
input_text.Response B: Dakota the Horse is a delightful addition to GUND's Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection! Dakota sports a pink gingham saddle, fuzzy tan mane and tail, and a gingham flower bridle accent. Embroidered horseshoes on the hooves add chic, realistic detail. This adorable plush horse features a huggable body and a lovely smile that's sure to make you smile, too! Surface-washable. Ideal for ages 1+. 11" length.
